document_data.name: Thousand Maws
document_data.mainbody: The '''Thousand Maws''' were a group of one hundred caves located in the [[Nether Mountains]] and were the homes of the [[Thousand Fists]] [[orc]] tribe.

Structure.Interior: A few of the caverns were overgrown with [[Wikipedia:mushroom|mushrooms]] and the Thousand Fists tribe would used slaves to collect and farm these locations.

document_data.History: For years the orcs of the Thousand Fists tribe dwelt on the southern passes of the Nether Mountains and fought against the [[Ripped Gut]] orc tribe over control of [[Moon Pass]]. In [[1372 DR]], the Thousand Fists created an alliance with their rivals after the influence of a [[tanarukk]] emissary who was sent from [[Hellgate Keep]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Blood of Morueme]] [[dragon]]s hunted the fringes of the Thousand Maws causing the Thousand Fists to move their livestock underground.
